Name: Dayana (Sergio) Ramos
Description:
Dayana had received anonymous threats and her murder was considered to be an execution. The aggressor shot fired seven shots at the victim inside a shop.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans: Portal El Debate. 02.10.2012

Name: R. J. de Jesus
Description:
On 4th October 2012 the skeletal remains of a body with a hole in the skull were found near the BR-365 highway. Two bullet casings were found nearby.

The victim is thought to have been a trans woman who had been missing for seven months.

> The Military Police located a human bones in a cane field on the banks of BR-365, in the stretch between Ituiutaba and trevão, a region better known as Venda Amarela. The suspicion is that the remains are that of [trans woman] Ricardo Júnior de Jesus, who disappeared seven months ago in the city.
>
> The military was called by sugar cane cutters. According to Sergeant Valentine, although it is not possible to identify whether the bones belonged to a man or a woman, it is possible that it is Ricardo, since she is missing and next to the body, two silicone prostheses were found.
>
> The [trans woman], according to information, worked as a call girl at the roundabout at the entrance to the city. "Everything suggests that it is his, because of the silicone, the wig and her disappearance," said the sergeant.
>
> There were also two shell casingss beside the bones and the skull had a perforation. All material was sent to IML for DNA tests, which should be ready within 30 days.

TvT project: Uipi, online portal, 04.10.2012

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2012/10/04/ricardo-junior-de-jesus-travesti-mg-ituiutaba/

https://uipi.com.br/destaques/destaque-1/2012/10/04/ossada-humana-e-encontrada-as-margens-da-br-365-em-ituiutaba/

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_4Rm539PXA8

Name: Luisa Duran
Description:
Luisa was stabbed over 50 times.

> On October 5, 2012, Luisa, a 40-year-old transsexual woman, was brutally murdered with 53 stab wounds in Santa Cruz. Almost 11 years later, the perpetrator has not been identified. It is known that he was a man who used to visit her and that he escaped from her after her attack.
>
> After ups and downs in the process, the complaint faces a lack of progress according to a report from the LGBTIQ+ observatory. Despite the years that have passed, [as of 2023] the search for justice remains without results.

TvT partner organisation  Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans. www.derechoshumanosbolivia.org   25.10.2012

https://www.opinion.com.bo/articulo/escena-del-crimen/mujeres-trans-asesinadas-bolivia-sentencias/20230826105609918651.html
Tweet:
Luisa was stabbed in Santa Cruz (Bolivia) on 5 Oct 2012.

She was 40. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Gabi Souza de Almeida
Description:
Gabi was one of four people attacked by an aggressor who entered an apartment on the early morning of Saturday 6th October and stabbed four people various times with a knife. Two died, including Gabi.

The attack took place on R. das Crianças. The aggressor reportedly had had an amorous relationship with one of the victims.

> The police are looking for a 36-year-old man suspected of killing two people and stabbing two others in the Novo Paraíso II neighborhood in Cuiabá. According to information passed on to the lieutenant colonel of the Military Police, Gilberto Duarte Vitório, the suspect invaded the residence at dawn on Saturday (6) and struck several knife blows against the four people.
>
> The motive, according to the policeman, was a betrayal. "He found out that his wife was cheating on him with another woman," he said. 
>
> Also according to the police, at the scene of the crime the suspect found his wife, her lover and two other people, one being a [trans woman]. One of the victims, 22, was stabbed in the chest and died on the spot. The police do not know whether the victim was the suspect's wife.
>
> The 21-year-old [trans woman], who was a friend of his lover, was hit with three stabs to the chest. He was rescued by an ambulance from the Mobile Emergency Service (Samu) and sent to the emergency department of the capital in serious condition. This Sunday (7), however, the Homicide and Protection of Persons (DHPP) confirmed that the victim did not survive.
>
> The other two victims were also rescued and are doing well. After the crime, the suspect fled the scene and, so far, has not yet been located by the police.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2012/10/06/nao-identificada-travesti-21-naos-facadas-mt-cuiaba/

Description:
Sheila was run over by a client after leaving the motel where she had been entertaining him.

A police officer is suspected to have been responsible.

> A civilian police officer is suspected of killing a [trans woman] [on Av. Bandeirantes] in the South Zone of Sao Paulo. The crime happened on Sunday morning (7). The [trans woman], known as Sheila, was run over after leaving a hotel parking lot with an alleged client.

Name: Dalila Wodzinski Rosa
Description:
Dalila and a man named she was with were both shot in the street. He survived, but she died at the scene.

> The body of the [trans woman] killed by gunshots on the banks of the railway line of Rua Kesser Zattar, in the Jarivatuba neighborhood, was identified last Wednesday (10). [deadname] Wodzinski Rosa, 37, was awaiting identification at the IML (Legal Medical Institute) of Joinville and was recognized. Dalila, as the [trans woman] was known in the South, worked as a sex worker and was a crack user.
>
> The circumstances of the death are being investigated by the Civil Police, but everything indicates that it is a case involving drug trafficking. When Rosa was shot, she was with Giovane de Lara, 30. He was hit in the mouth, in the chest and was rescued by Samu. The man remains hospitalized at Hospital Municipal São José. His condition is serious.

A suspect was arrested on 17th December.

TvT project: Nd Online, online portal, 12.10.2012

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2012/10/10/dalila-russel-keim-wodzinski-rosa-travesti-37-anos-tiros-sc-joinville/

Name: Kelly Mota da Conceicao
Description:
Kelly's decomposing body was found with stab wounds inside her home on 14th October. It is believe that she was killed two days earlier in a robbery.

> Manaus - The hairdresser [deadname] da Mota Conceição, 47, was found dead inside the house where she lived on Rua Jaboirana, Jorge Teixeira 2, in the east of Manaus. According to Corporal Ronaldo Lima of the 14th Companhia Interativa Comunitária (Cicom), when she was found, the victim's body was lying on the floor of the room wrapped in a towel and already in a state of decomposition. The Civil Police (PC) are working with the hypothesis that the crime occurred on the night of last Friday.

TvT project: A Critica, 14.10.2012

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2012/10/14/kelly-valdir-mota-da-conceicao-travesti-47-anos-facadas-am-manaus/

Name: Shakira Rodrigues dos Santos
Description:
Shakira was shot in the head after an argument while drinking with friends inside a bar. After an argument she was shot into the head.

> A [trans woman] known as Shakira was murdered at dawn this Saturday in a bar in the Center of Abreu e Lima, in the Metropolitan Region of Recife. [Deadname] Rodrigues dos Santos, 34, was drinking with friends when, after a disagreement, she was executed with a gunshot to the head. According to police, the victim was known for committing minor robberies in the area, prostituting herself and using drugs.
>
> When examined by the experts, it was found that Shakira's body also had marks from other injuries. A bottle scar on the head was found near the location hit by the shot. According to witnesses, this fight took place in the same location, the Bar do Galego.
The case will be investigated by the Department of Homicide and Personal Protection (DHPP).

TvT project: Diario de Pernambuco, 13.10.2012

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2012/10/13/shakira-ronaldo-rodrigues-dos-santos-travesti-34-anos-tiros-pe-recife/

Name: Luisa (July César) Cedeño Morgan
Description:
The victim and the suspected perpetrator, Didier Orión, returned home in a taxi. When they were near their respective apartments, the victim went to urinate, when the aggressor attacked her with a cobblestone, beating her to death with six blows.

*Editor's Note: The correct location may actually be Américas 1, Managua.*

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans. NuevaYa.com.Ni  24.10.2012

Name: Janette Tovar
Description:
Janette was beaten to death by her abusive partner.

> Janette Tovar died on Oct. 15, 2012, at the age of 43. Her boyfriend, Jonathan Stuart Kenney, 27, allegedly assaulted her.
>
> Witnesses saw the couple fighting early in the morning in the 800 block of West Davis Street in Oak Cliff. Kenney allegedly slammed Tovar’s head against concrete. After they returned to their home in the 900 block of W. Eighth Street, three blocks away, he allegedly continued to assault her. Hours later, Kenney found her unresponsive and called 911.
>
> Kenney provided a statement to the police admitting that he slammed Tovar’s head into the concrete and continued assaulting her at home. Although Kenney was originally arrested on murder charges, the charges were lowered to assault because prosecutors did not feel they had the evidence to prove murder. Kenney has a court date set for Jan. 22.
>
> Before her death, Tovar told friends about the violence at home. Friends said they had seen the couple argue, but had not witnessed violence. Others said they didn’t want to get involved in a murder. One, who was with the couple the night before the assault, was engaged and not supposed to be out that night. She was worried about her own relationship and declined to answer questions. So rather than get involved, people let someone who allegedly killed their friend get away with murder.

Subsequently Kenny was sentenced to 10 years probation.

> Originally, Kenney was charged with first degree murder. In a deal, he pleaded guilty to aggravated assault, also a first degree felony, in exchange for probation. If he violates his probation, he could be sent to prison for life. If he doesn’t happen to kill anyone else or violate his parole, Kenney avoids a conviction on his record.
>
> During the sentencing, Tovar’s mother took the stand. She said through a translator that she didn’t think 10 years probation was justice. Then she began crying and yelled at Kenney in Spanish, but didn’t wait for the translator.

TvT project: Dallas Voice 26.10.2012 & 31.10.2012; Planet Transgender 28.10.2012

https://planettransgender.com/dallas-man-to-be-given-probation-tuesday-for-the-murder-of-trans-woman-janette-tovar/

https://dallasvoice.com/dallas-man-received-10-years-probation-trans-murder/

Name: La Vicky (Víctor Manuel) Cool Canul
Description:
Vicky was a hairdresser who was attacked by a neighbour named Delfino. She had been threatened by him before and had reported him to the police.

When detained Delfino ranted that "he was a saviour like Jesus and that he killed the homosexual stylist with machete slashes because he was the demon and he did not want him to do any further harm”.

The murder took place on Calle Venustiano Carranza de Bonfil.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans: Diario de Quintana Roo, Online. 16.10.2012

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was shot by the occupant of a vehicle which pulled up near her while she was working.

> A [trans woman] was murdered in São Vicente , on the coast of São Paulo, at dawn on Wednesday (17). The crime took place on rua Caramuru, near a region known as Old Aviation. According to the Military Police, the place is well known as a point of prostitution for [trans womwn] and also for the use and trafficking of drugs.
>
> According to the police, people at the scene saw a yellow car passing by. The vehicle stopped near the [trans woman] and several shots were heard shortly thereafter. Police were called to the scene and found the body with gunshot wounds in the head region. The victim was 33 years old and according to a friend was a drug user.

TvT project: Noticias R7, online portal, 10.10.2012

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2012/10/17/nao-identificado-travesti-33-anos-tiros-sp-sao-vicente/

Name: Jade Mello
Description:
Jade was stabbed in the early morning on a street. She died in hospital hours later after confirming that her assilant was known to her.

The attack took place on R. Hormell Nunes Duarte.

> The investigative team of the 3rd Police Station is investigating the second homicide of the year in the Casino resort (the 16th in Rio Grande). The victim, identified as [deadname] Mello (Jade), 46, was stabbed to death in the early hours of Wednesday, 17.
>
> According to the police report, at about 2:30 am, the Military Brigade was informed that two [people] were be fighting on Rua Nunes Duarte, Cassino. A garrison was immediately deployed to answer the call.

> Arriving at the scene, the military police found a [woman] lying on the floor, with mouth injuries and perforations in [her] abdomen. The victim was rescued and taken to the Casino Health Post, and later transferred to the emergency room of Santa Casa.
>
> At around 4:29 am the victim told the medical team that the perpetrator of the assault was her companion. At 11:40am the following morning she died in the operating room due to hemorrhagic shock.

TvT project: Jornal Agora, online portal, 18.10.2012

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2012/10/17/jade-luiz-savio-claudio-mello-travesti-46-anos-facadas-rs-balneario-cassino/

http://www.jornalagora.com.br/site/content/noticias/detalhe.php?e=7&n=34868

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was attacked and killed by a couple who lived nearby. Neighbours reported that the victim had been persecuted by them before

> At dawn on Tuesday (23), a [trans woman] was stoned to death near Portelinha, Paripe neighborhood, a railway suburb of Salvador (BA).
>
> According to witnesses, the [trans woman] was stoned to death by a couple who lived in the same region. The Military Police reported that the victim, who has not yet been identified, arrived at Rua Eduardo Doto, where she lives, and was met with violence by the couple.
>
> According to a report on the "Terra" website, direct from Salvador, the [trans woman] died at the scene. Neighbors laimed that the victim had suffered persecution by the couple. The investigation is continuing at the Homicide and Personal Protection Office (DHPP).

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans: noticias.terra.com.br   23.10.2012

Name: Madona Lima Chagas
Description:
Madona was attacked on Friday 19th October by unknown individuals who hit her with cobblestones. She died in hospital four days later.

> A 39 year old trans person was stoned to death in the city of Aracaju, Brazil.
>
> The 39 year-old was well known and liked, known locally as ‘Madona’, died from her wounds earlier this week, after she was attacked by an unknown group of people with cobblestones.
>
> Madonna received mortal blows and was admitted to a hospital in Aracaju, the capital of the state of Sergipe, Brazil, in the early hours of Friday last week. She died four days later from severe head injuries.
>
> Maria Livia Vieira, one of Madona’s neighbor told the Brazilian portal infonet: ‘She was a very funny, happy person, who loved to dance and be playful, she didn’t hurt anyone.’
>
> Madona was a well known figure in Aracaju’s nightlife, Infonet interviewed several people who described how she used to walk around at night and joke with people.

TvT partner organisation  Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans

https://www.gaystarnews.com/article/brazil-trans-stoned-death261012/

https://homofobiamata.wordpress.com/2012/10/23/amos-lima-chagas-travesti-39-anos-espancamento-se-aracaju/

Name: Malena Suarez
Description:
Marina was a trans activist of Transexuales y Transgeneros en Marcha. Members of her organization believe that Marina was killed because she was transgender. She was the 30th victim of known anti- LGBT-violence in the last 10 years in Puerto Rico.

TvT project: Windy City Media 23.10.2012



Malena's body was found in her home withmultiple stab wounds to the back. It is not known how long she had been dead before she was found.

> Puerto Rico experienced its 30th anti-LGBTQ homicide in the past ten years when the body of transwoman Malena Suarez was found dead in her home in Carolina with multiple stab wounds in her back. Ten of those murders have been in the last two years, according to a report by the National Coalition of Anti-Violence Programs.  Puerto Rico officials have not yet classified any of the homicides as hate crimes under either local law or the Matthew Shepard and James Byrd Jr. Hate Crimes Prevention Act.
>
> Suarez was a volunteer with the transgender advocacy organization Transexuales y Transgeneros en Marcha (TTM). It is reportedly unclear how long she had been dead when the body was found.
>
> TTM members believe that Suarez was killed because she was transgender.  Local media reports have not acknowledged Suarez's transgender identity, continuing a trend of inaccurate media reports of transgender victims of violence in Puerto Rico.

TvT project: Windy City Media 23.10.2012

https://www.windycitytimes.com/lgbt/Transgender-murder-30th-anti-LGBTQ-homicide-in-Puerto-Rico-in-decade/40036.html

https://www.dailykos.com/stories/2012/10/28/1151543/-Two-more-murdered-transwomen-by-multiple-stabbings-in-Puerto-Rico-and-by-stoning-in-Brazil

Name: Raica Morais Costa
Description:
Raica's body was found on Estr. Da Ceasa with hands and feet tied and gunshot wounds to the head and chest.

> The family of [deadname] Moraes Costa, 18, known as "Rayza" [most reports give her social name as Raica], calls for justice for her death. The [trans woman] was found dead last Sunday (28), near the Ceasa road, in Belém. The request is for those responsible to be arrested as on as possible. She would have turned 19 on the next 4th.
>
> The victim was from the municipality of Mocajuba, but lived in a kitchenette, in Belém, with a friend. According to the family, Rayza was not a drug user and had no involvement in drug trafficking. The burial took place yesterday, around 16h.
>
> There is no confirmation that the crime was related to homophobia. The case is being followed by the Homicide Division of the Civil Police and investigators from the Marco Urban Section.

In December 2012 Gleyson Charles Araujo Barreiros Culaço, 23, was arrested on suspicion of murder. He had had a relationship with Raica for 3 years.

TvT project: Diario Online, online portal, 28.10.2012

Name: Erla Amaral de Loiola
Description:
Erla's body was found alongside the BR-163 highway early on Sunday 28th October.

> An 18-year-old [trans woman] was murdered at dawn this Sunday (28th) on the perimeter of BR-163, in Sorriso (420 km from Cuiabá).
>
> The crime happened around 4:30 am, a security guard at a nearby ompany, heard the shots and called the military police to investigate what happened. 
>
> When the Military Police arrived at the scene, they found that the victim, identified as [deadname] Cristian Amaral Loiola, had not survived her wounds and was dead. The death was confirmed by the Fire Department. The crime scene was then isolated so that an investigation could be carried out.
>
> There is no information as to who committed the murder or the motive for the crime. The crime will be investigated by the Municipal Civil Police.

Name: Angy (Ángel) Hernández Rosales
Description:
Angy was killed by an unknown person inside her own apartment.

TvT partner organisation  Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans www.launion.com.mx   31.10.2012
